subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer of the United States took the overall lead of the Vuelta a España after an eighth stage won by David Moncoutie of France in Salardu. Moncoutie completed the 94-mile stage in the Pyrenees in 4 hours 24 minutes 58 seconds. Leipheimer, of Astana, is 21 seconds ahead of his teammate Alberto Contador.
